oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Hall of Fame 25th Anniversary - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of 3. Recording is of a number of performances for the Country Music Hall of Fame 25th Anniversary. Segment is hosted by Hank Williams Jr. (performer) and features: Clint Black (performer), Clarence "Gatemouth" Brown (performer), Wynonna Judd (performer), and Mary Chapin Carpenter (performer). Recording occurred April 01, 1992.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams Jr.; Clint Black; Clarence "Gatemouth" Brown; Wynonna Judd; Mary Chapin Carpenter
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Clint Black greets the crowd and introduces the 25th anniversary of the Country Music Hall of Fame -- (00:37) T for Texas [excerpt] (Clint Black) -- (02:41) Hank Williams Jr. discusses the Blues -- (03:03) You Can't Judge a Book (By Looking at the Cover) [excerpt] (Hank Williams) -- (04:09) Williams Jr. discusses the roots of rock-n-roll and introduces Clarence "Gatemouth" Brown -- (04:59) Williams Jr. discusses the roots of rock-n-roll and introduces Clarence "Gatemouth" Brown -- (05:15) I Think I'm Better Off With the Blues (Clarence "Gatemouth" Brown) -- (08:07) Williams Jr. introduces Wyonna Judd -- (08:25) What it Takes (Wynonna Judd) -- (12:38) One Night With You [excerpt] (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (13:16) Williams Jr. discusses a piano played by Elvis Presley -- (13:57) Come on Over to the Country (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (18:12) I am a Town (Mary Chapin Carpenter)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, Jr., 1949-; Black, Clint; Brown, Clarence, 1924-2005; Judd, Wynonna, 1964-; Carpenter, Mary Chapin, 1958-;
